text: The Belgium national under-18 and under-19 basketball team is the national representative for Belgium in international under-18 and under-19 basketball tournaments. They are administered by Basketball Belgium. The team competes at the FIBA U18 European Championship, with the opportunity to qualify for the FIBA Under-19 World Cup. ==See also== *Belgium national basketball team *Belgium national under-17 basketball team ==References== ==External links== *Official website *FIBA profile Category:Basketball in Belgium Category:Basketball teams in Belgium Category:National under-18 basketball teams Category:National under-19 basketball teams Basketball
title: Belgium men's national under-19 basketball team
